creator.description:
EXPERIMENTAL ACCOUNT - Please do not interact with it.

This is an unofficial labeler assigning bias, credibility, and a factual reporting labels to media accounts based on data obtained from Media Bias / Fact Check at mediabiasfactcheck.com

locales.description: A media source that has been assigned the 'Conspiracy-Pseudoscience' label in the 'Bias' category by Media Bias / Fact Check. More information is available on their website at mediabiasfactcheck.com
locales.name: Bias: Conspiracy-Pseudoscience

locales.description: A media source that has been assigned the 'Least Biased' label in the 'Bias' category by Media Bias / Fact Check. More information is available on their website at mediabiasfactcheck.com
